description:
Asmodeus, Beelzebub, and Belphegor destroy Lucifer`s precious ship in a bottle. With none of them wanting to be the one to tell Lucifer, the three brothers harness the power of psychological warfare to try and force the others to put their necks on the line.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The First Great Sibling Psychological War
第一次兄弟心理大戦争!
